sentence.Network_en: an overemphasis on curing illness rather than preventing it
sentence.Network_cn: 过分强调治病而不事预防

sentence.Network_en: He attributed the party's lack of success to an overemphasis on ideology and ideas.
sentence.Network_cn: 他将该党的失败归因于过分强调意识形态和理念。

sentence.Network_en: Paradoxically, Africa's food problems are often ascribed to an overemphasis on nonfood drops.
sentence.Network_cn: 荒谬的是, 非洲的粮食问题往往归咎于过分重视非粮食作物.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(O2) - 商务英语词汇 ... overdrink 饮过量 overemphasis 过分的强调 overemphasized 过分强调的.
英语字母O开头的英语单词有哪些？ - 已解决 -... ... overcrowding 过度拥挤 overemphasis 过分强调 outstretched 伸展的.

list.abs: traditional intelligence theory overemphasis on language and logic-mathematical ability , ignored other equally important intelligence in the survival and development of individual .传统的智力理论过分强调语言和数理逻辑智能，忽视了在个体生存与发展中同样重要的其它智能。

Chinese students attribute their lack of communication in English to an overemphasis on grammar and thus resist grammar practice and reviews in their self-study programs .中国学生属性，他们在英语交流缺乏对过分强调语法，从而抵制语法的练习和自我检讨，研究计划。

Webers " value-neutral " sociology exerts great influence on contemporary social sciences , but overemphasis on value neutral will impair the objectivity and value of scientific research .韦伯“价值中立”学说对当代社会科学的影响很大，但片面强调价值的中立性会损害科学研究的客观性和价值性。
overemphasis the speed and brevity with which someone can receive a degree ( eg " Call now and have your degree shipped to you overnight ! " ) .过分强调速度和简洁与有人可以接受的程度（例如“现在请和您的程度，运到你通宵！”)。

entry.def: If you say that there is an overemphasis on a particular thing, you mean that more importance or attention is given to it than is necessary.

example.ex: He attributed the party's lack of success to an overemphasis on ideology and ideas.
example.tran: 他将该党的失败归因于过分强调意识形态和理念。
